articles.title: CAPSTONE Team Regains Attitude Control of Spacecraft – No Longer Tumbling Through Space - SciTechDaily
articles.description: On Friday, October 7, CAPSTONE team members successfully executed an operation to stop the spacecraft’s spin. This clears a major hurdle in returning the spacecraft to normal operations. Following a planned trajectory correction maneuver on September 8, CAPST…
